sen.j: 夕日ヶ浦温泉（ゆうひがうらおんせん）は、京都府京丹後市網野町（旧国丹後国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Yuhigaura Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Amino-cho Tango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under an ancient administrative division).
Yuhigaura Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Amino-cho Tango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under an ancient administrative division).
Yuhigaura Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Amino-cho, Tango City, Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under an ancient administrative division).
sen.cmt: カンマを追加しました。

sen.j: 浜詰温泉とあわせて夕日ヶ浦温泉郷といわれることがある。
sen.e: Hamazume Hot Spring may be included and collectively called Yuhigaura Hot Spring.
Hamazume Hot Spring may be included and collectively called Yuhigaura Hot Spring.
Hamazume Hot Spring may be included and collectively called Yuhigaura Hot Spring.

sen.j: 鉄道：北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線網野駅・木津温泉駅よりタクシーで約5分。
sen.e: Railway: 5 minutes by taxi from Amino Station of the Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line,
Railway: 5 minutes by taxi from Amino Station of the Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line,
Railway: five minutes by taxi from Amino Station and Kitsu-onsen Station of the Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。木津温泉 を追加しました。

sen.j: バス：大阪からの直行バスが運行されるほか、旅館の送迎が京阪神まで行くこともある。
sen.e: Bus: A direct bus service is available from Osaka and, in addition, some inns have a courtesy car service from Keihanshin.
Bus: A direct bus service is available from Osaka and, in addition, some inns have a courtesy car service from Keihanshin.
Bus: A direct bus service is available from Osaka and, in addition, some inns have a courtesy car service to Keihanshin (Osaka, Kyoto and Kobe) area.
sen.cmt: 京阪神の補足を追加しました。

sen.j: それ以外に定期路線バスが、京都より「かにちゃんあみの直行便」。
sen.e: There is also a regular service of buses named "Kanichan Amino Chokkobin (nonstop buses to Amino) from Kyoto.
There is also a regular service of buses named "Kanichan Amino Chokkobin (nonstop buses to Amino) from Kyoto.
There is also a regular service of buses named 'Kanichan Amino Chokkobin' (nonstop buses to Amino) from Kyoto.

sen.j: 大阪神戸より「かに直行バス」として、冬の間運行される。
sen.e: A seasonal buses named Kani Chokko Bus (Kani nonstop bus) are available during the winter.
Seasonal buses named Kani Chokko Bus (Kani nonstop bus) are available during the winter.
Seasonal buses named 'Kani Chokko Bus' (Kani nonstop bus) are available during the winter.

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に小文字にしました。

sen.e: Simple hot spring
Simple hot spring
Simple hot spring
Temperatures of the spring source: 40 to 43℃
Temperatures of the spring source: 40 to 43℃
Temperatures of the spring source: 40 to 43 degrees Celsius.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.e: It is nicknamed Bijin-no-yu Hot Spring
Nicknamed "Bijin-no-yu" Hot Spring
Nicknamed 'Bijin-no-yu' (a hot spring of beauty) Hot Spring
sen.cmt: 美人の湯の補足を追加しました。

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に小文字にしました。

sen.j: 日本の夕日百選にも選ばれた夕日の名所である夕日ヶ浦（浜詰海岸）周辺に温泉街が広がる。
sen.e: A hot spring resort area extends near the Hamazume Coast, a noted place selected as one of Japan's best 100 sunset locations.
A hot spring resort area extends near the Hamazume Coast, a place noted as one of Japan's best 100 sunset locations.
A hot spring resort area extends near Yuhigaura (the Hamazume Coast), a place noted as one of Japan's best 100 sunset locations.
sen.cmt: 夕日ヶ浦 を追加しました。

sen.j: 旅館、民宿は16軒存在する。
sen.e: There are 16 inns and guest houses.
There are 16 inns and guest houses.
There are 16 inns and guest houses.

sen.j: 浜詰（はまづめ）と呼ばれる地区を中心に、冬の「かに」料理を楽しむことのできる旅館などがあり、京阪神からの集客を積極的に行っている。
sen.e: During the winter season, some inns mainly in an area called Hamazume actively attract visitors from Keihanshin by serving dishes of winter crabs.
During the winter season, inns in the Hmazume area attract visitors from Keihanshin by serving dishes of winter crabs.
During the winter season, inns in the Hamazume area attract visitors from Keihanshin by serving dishes of winter crabs.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 近くの木津温泉、あるいは、久美浜と一体的に宣伝活動を繰り広げ「網野浜詰」としての知名度は「冬のかに」で非常に高いものである。
sen.e: With extensive promotion activities together with Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring and Kumihama, Amino Hamazume has been widely known for its "winter crabs."
With extensive promotion activities together with Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring and Kumihama, Amino Hamazume has been widely known for its "winter crabs."
With extensive promotion activities together with Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring and Kumihama, 'Amino Hamazume' has been widely known for its 'winter crabs.'

sen.j: 近くには夕日ヶ浦海水浴があり、夏場は海水浴客で賑わう。
sen.e: The nearby Yuhigaura Beach is crowded with sea bathers during the summer.
The nearby Yuhigaura Beach is crowded with sea bathers during the summer.
The nearby Yuhigaura Beach is crowded with sea bathers during the summer.

sen.j: 温泉街にある旅館では、砂風呂を楽しむことが出来る旅館も存在する。
sen.e: A sand bath can be enjoyed in some inns in the hot spring resort area.
A sand bath can be enjoyed in some inns in the hot spring resort area.
A sand bath can be enjoyed in some inns in the hot spring resort area.

sen.j: 近くには鳴き砂で有名な琴引浜があり、同地には露天風呂も存在する。
sen.e: An open-air spa is available in the nearby Kotobiki-hama beach, which is famous for singing sand.
An open-air spa is available in the nearby Kotobiki-hama beach, which is famous for sand that sounds like it sings.
An open-air spa is available in the nearby Kotobiki-hama beach, which is famous for sand that sounds like it sings.
